title: pretty nice, but otr needs a bit of work
comment: It's open source, looks good and supports OTR, so that's nice. But I wish it 1. had a simple checkbox for "use orbot" instead of having to enter the info manually, and 2. would remember the OTR status so I didn't have to click "start OTR" each and every time I chat.  Since I don't really need multiple accounts I'll stick with Gibberbot for now.
